Action.Name: Application.GetPageOrDialog
Action.Description: Returns the name of the current page or dialog.

Action.Name: Application.IsDialog
Action.Description: Determines whether or not the current window is a dialog.

Action.Name: DialogEx.Close
Action.Description: Together with the revised, DialogEx.Show() function, this function allows the programmer to return any variable type from a DialogEx window.

Arg.Name: Argument
Arg.Description: The argument you wish to return.

Action.Name: DialogEx.Show
Action.Description: Together with the revised, DialogEx.Close() function, this function allows the programmer to return any variable type from a DialogEx window.

Arg.Name: Dialog
Arg.Description: The name of the Dialog you wish to show.

Action.Name: Folder.Clear
Action.Description: Removes all files and sub folders from the specifed folder.

Action.Name: Folder.GetEndFolder
Action.Description: Gets the name of the last folder in a folder path.

Arg.Name: Use Web Format
Arg.Description: Whether or not to use forward slashes instead of backslashes.

Action.Name: Folder.GetParent
Action.Description: Gets the parent folder of the specified folder path.

Arg.Name: Use Web Format
Arg.Description: Whether or not to use forward slashes instead of backslashes.

Action.Name: Folder.GetSize
Action.Description: Gets the size of folder including all files and subfolders in bytes.

Arg.Name: Folder
Arg.Description: The folder whose size to get.

Action.Name: String.Capatalize
Action.Description: Capatalizes the first letter of a string.

Action.Name: String.IsBlank
Action.Description: Determines whether or not the input string is blank.

Arg.Name: Remove Spaces
Arg.Description: Whether or not all spaces should be removed when checking the string.

Action.Name: String.ToTable
Action.Description: Creates a table from a delimited string.

Arg.Name: String
Arg.Description: The original string to convert to a table.

Arg.Name: Delimiter
Arg.Description: The control character that delimits the sections of the string that should separate.

Action.Name: Window.Center
Action.Description: Centers a window in the middle of the user's desktop.

Arg.Name: Handle
Arg.Description: The handle of the window to center.
